properties.name: England
properties.description: Posted by Karly3  Country: England! : ) Composers: The Beatles: John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison, and Ringo Starr. William Byrd, Henry Purcell. Genres: rock, soul, odes, Henry Purcell mostly did opera and incidental music for the stage. William Byrd did sacered music, songs in Madrigals, key board works, consort pieces for viols. Instruments:harp,zink,gamba,lizard, pulican,rackett,serpent,lute,saxbut,and the bagpipe. Songs by the Beatles: Hey Jude, Hello GoodBye, Come Together, Hard Days Night, Yesterday. Fun Facts: The Beatles were one of the top artists all over the world!

properties.name: Sri Lanka
properties.description: Posted by Lacey17  Name of Country: Sri Lanka Genres: Folk,Kolam, Nadagam, Noorthy, Film, Classical, Western, and others. Top 10 Most Popular Songs By 5/15/08: 1. Sokari Yanna Epa 2.Oba Innana Nam 3.Ma Obe Suda 4.Pemwathiyanne 5.Suwanda Dena 6.Maa Laugatama Thawa 7.Eka Mohothak 8. Suvanda Rosa Malnela 9.Sithuwii Siravee 10. Upul Kopul Instruments: drums(one face, two face, flat face), Gataberg, Yak-bera, Dawual, Thamatt, Udekki, Rabana. Fun Facts: -The British introduced Western music and the piano in 1815. -Music of Sri Lanka can be divided in 7 catagories. -Sunil Santha introduced what Sri Lankans call light music. Composers and their Work: -Ananda Samarakone composed the Sri Lankan National Anthem. -Most Sri Lankan composers maks their own variety of music, so their are not to many well known composers.

properties.name: australia
properties.description: Posted by Tcserin Genres: rock, traditonal, jazz, and country. Instruments: boomerang, clubs, sticks, hollow logs, drum, seed rattles, didgeridoo, bullroarer, and gum-leaf. Composers: Percey Granger, Pessy Glainville, Bos Bandit, Andrew yencken, David Page, David Cheswork, Warren Burt, John Meridith, Peter Fraser, Rusty Stewert, Kev Carmondy, and William Barton. Top Songs: The Possom, Tie Me Kangaroo Down, Wild Rover, provers, The Gum Trees, and Kookubura. Funny Fun Facts: Australia is the largest island. It\'s the Smallest continent It\'s home to the Kangaroo Sydney is the largest city Australia has a hot climate It\'s the only country that is also a continent
